profile_summary:
As a Senior Full Stack Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess a strong command of **TypeScript**, **ReactJS**, **NodeJS**, and **NestJS** for developing high-performance solutions, including RESTful APIs and data-driven applications. I have effectively utilized **PostgreSQL** for database management and have hands-on experience with **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Google Cloud** while adhering to Agile methodologies and implementing robust DevOps practices.
My proficiency in **Git** ensures seamless version control, while my focus on clean code and problem-solving drives successful project outcomes. 
Additionally, I have a proven track record of developing enterprise-grade applications that leverage **Apache Echarts** and **AG Grid** to enhance user experience. My soft skills in communication foster collaboration across teams, ultimately aligning technical goals with business objectives. My experience also extends to cloud deployment, where I ensure compliance with industry standards, adding value in sectors like healthcare and finance.
